item.description:
Game Ticket and Sports Networking in Cumberland Farms Roof Terrace 

Meet with senior Red Sox Staff in a casual enviornment

Attending:

Adam Grossman SVP Marketing and Brand Development

More info at www.teamworkonline.comTroup Parkinson SVP Corporate Partnerships

David Freidman SVP and Special Counsel

Tim Zue VP Business Development

Carrie Campbell VP Sales and Services Fenway Enterprises

Gena Borson Interim Executive Director & Director of Special Events Red Sox Foundation

Marcita Thompson Director of Fenay Park Tours and Event Operations

Amy Waryas VP Human Resources

Register 5:00pm

Event starts at 5:30pm

Game vs Oakland Athletics

LIMITED Tickets start at $82.00 with promo code "teamwork" on mlb/redsox.com

More info at www.teamworkonline.com

Dress Business Casual
item.how_to_find_us: No Event Host, Attendees E Mail each other
item.name: Red Sox Networking Event and Game Ticket
